languages.text: "Мы сошлись в споре о доблести и вдохновенности! Битва наполняет сердце истинного воина восторгом, а разум — пронзительной ясностью, и мы на Фенрисе особо чтим тех, кто возвышается над сражением и делится с товарищами своей радостью".

"We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."
languages.original_text: "Мы сошлись в споре о доблести и вдохновенности! Битва наполняет сердце истинного воина восторгом, а разум — пронзительной ясностью, и мы на Фенрисе особо чтим тех, кто возвышается над сражением и делится с товарищами своей радостью".

traits.locale_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我们在勇气与灵感的争论中发生了冲突！战斗可以让真正的战士头脑清醒，心怀喜悦。我们芬里斯人尤为敬重那些在战斗中表现出色，并愿意与战友一同分享喜悦的人。”
languages.original_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."

traits.locale_text: “我们在勇气与灵感的争论中发生了冲突！战斗可以让真正的战士头脑清醒，心怀喜悦。我们芬里斯人尤为敬重那些在战斗中表现出色，并愿意与战友一同分享喜悦的人。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「勇気とひらめきを巡る論争のぶつかり合いだったんだ！戦いは真の戦士の心を喜びで、頭脳を鋭い冴えで満たしてくれる。俺たちフェンリスの戦士は言葉の戦いを突破して、仲間と喜びを分かち合える者、という特別な栄誉を手にするんだ」
languages.original_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."

traits.locale_text: 「勇気とひらめきを巡る論争のぶつかり合いだったんだ！戦いは真の戦士の心を喜びで、頭脳を鋭い冴えで満たしてくれる。俺たちフェンリスの戦士は言葉の戦いを突破して、仲間と喜びを分かち合える者、という特別な栄誉を手にするんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Nos enfrascamos en una disputa por el valor y la inspiración! La batalla infunde alegría en el corazón de los auténticos guerreros, así como claridad en el alma. En Fenris se prima mucho salir de la contienda y compartir la alegría con los camaradas».
languages.original_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."

traits.locale_text: «¡Nos enfrascamos en una disputa por el valor y la inspiración! La batalla infunde alegría en el corazón de los auténticos guerreros, así como claridad en el alma. En Fenris se prima mucho salir de la contienda y compartir la alegría con los camaradas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Nous nous sommes affrontés dans une démonstration de bravoure et d'inspiration ! Le combat emplit d'allégresse le cœur d'un vrai guerrier et confère à son esprit une clarté pénétrante. Et sur Fenris, nous honorons tout particulièrement ceux qui se distinguent et partagent leur joie avec leurs camarades. »
languages.original_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous sommes affrontés dans une démonstration de bravoure et d'inspiration ! Le combat emplit d'allégresse le cœur d'un vrai guerrier et confère à son esprit une clarté pénétrante. Et sur Fenris, nous honorons tout particulièrement ceux qui se distinguent et partagent leur joie avec leurs camarades. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben einen Disput über Mut und Inspiration ausgetragen! Der Kampf füllt das Herz des wahren Kriegers mit Freude und seinen Geist mit messerscharfer Klarheit, und wir auf Fenris ehren vor allem jene, die sich über das Getümmel erheben und ihre Freude mit ihren Kameraden teilen."
languages.original_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben einen Disput über Mut und Inspiration ausgetragen! Der Kampf füllt das Herz des wahren Kriegers mit Freude und seinen Geist mit messerscharfer Klarheit, und wir auf Fenris ehren vor allem jene, die sich über das Getümmel erheben und ihre Freude mit ihren Kameraden teilen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yiğitlik ve ilham üzerine bir tartışmada kapıştık! Savaş, gerçek savaşçıların yüreğini neşeyle, zihniniyse delici bir netlikle doldurur. Fenris'te savaşın üstesinden gelip neşesini yoldaşlarıyla paylaşanları özel olarak onurlandırırız."
languages.original_text: "We clashed in a dispute over valour and inspiration! Battle fills the true warrior's heart with joy and his mind with piercing clarity, and we on Fenris hold in special honour those who rise above the fray and share their joy with their comrades."

traits.locale_text: "Yiğitlik ve ilham üzerine bir tartışmada dövüştük! Savaş, gerçek savaşçıların yüreğini neşeyle, zihniniyse delici bir netlikle doldurur. Fenris'te savaşın üstesinden gelip neşelerini yoldaşlarıyla paylaşanları özel olarak onurlandırırız."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
